results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^k * (1 - x)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: G.f.: exp(Sum_{k>=1} x^k * Sum_{d|k} (-1)^(d+1)*(1 - x)^d/d). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 16 2019
